fields_of_interest: Economy, finance and the euro, Budget, Trade, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Business and Industry, Single market, Banking and financial services
head_office_address: Chevender Cottage Prince Imperial Road Chislehurst, Kent
eu_initiatives: All EU initiatives relevant for Eurozone economies and financial markets
section: IV - Think tanks, research and academic institutions
relevant_communication: All EU policy initiatives, public relations and communication activities relevant for Eurozone economies and financial markets
goals__remit: A London-based provider of independent, rigorous, straight-talking macroeconomic analysis, forecasts, and consultancy. Insightful analysis, succinct and easy-to-digest reports. A research service to help clients make better decisions, complementary to the baseline economic research provided by investment banks. A research focus on market-relevant topics, with policy implications, on Eurozone economic developments (on aggregate), ECB monetary policy, fiscal policy in the EU/Eurozone and specific issues and market relevant debates in Brussels. Specific attention to developments of the Italian economy and of countries that could become problematic or provide good opportunities such as Greece.
